video_title: How to build a million dollar sales funnel using Facebook Ads

content_profile.title: How to build a million dollar sales funnel using Facebook Ads

key_takeaways: Solution: Switch to Basecamp and eliminate Slack (Difficulty: intermediate)
Growth Tactic: Systematic Facebook and Google ads implementation (Channel: paid-ads)
Strategy: Use paid ads as primary business growth method
Strategy: Switch from communication-heavy tools to execution-focused tools
Startup Opportunity: Non-agency Facebook and Google ads service for small businesses (Target: Small businesses, startups, solopreneurs)

startup_ideas.title: Non-agency Facebook and Google ads service for small businesses
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Complex ad setup and management without expensive agency overhead
startup_ideas.business_model: Service packages for basic Meta ads and Google search ads
startup_ideas.validation: Market described as having 'massive empty space'

trend_opportunities.title: Backlash against over-communication in workplace tools
trend_opportunities.opportunity: Tools focused on execution rather than communication

trend_opportunities.title: Demand for trustworthy, non-agency advertising services
trend_opportunities.opportunity: Fill gap between expensive agencies and untrustworthy individual consultants

comment_derived_trends.trend: High demand for detailed funnel building workshops and education
supporting_comments: +1 for the 3-4 hours whiteboard funnel workshop
We want a funnel and copywriting guide/workshop
Yes yes yes to the live funnel please
comment_derived_trends.business_implication: Strong market opportunity for comprehensive funnel education products/services

comment_derived_trends.trend: Preference for practical, hands-on learning over theoretical content
supporting_comments: Would love to see you guys set one up

comment_derived_trends.business_implication: Market values implementation-focused content and live demonstrations
